entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
